# Neothink+

> After 50+ years operating as an underground success network, we are now passing the keys to the kingdom to a new generation of value creators, integrated thinkers, and self-leaders.

## Identity

- **Name:** Neothink+
- **Type:** Administrative Portal for the Neothink Ecosystem
- **Domain:** neothink.io
- **Tagline:** "Prosper Happily Forever" | "Go Further, Faster, Forever"
- **Founded:** 1968 (I & O Publishing) | 2007 (Neothink Society) | 2024 (Public Launch)

## Who We Are

We are the architects of a self-evolutionary movement focused on preserving the ultimate value in the universe: human consciousness. Our identity is defined by the Neothink mentalityâ€”a mental modality that shatters the "following mode" and replaces it with self-leadership and value creation.

**Core Identities:**
- **Value Creators:** Individuals who build new knowledge and wealth through original contributions
- **Integrated Thinkers:** Those who snap together puzzle pieces to reveal reality others cannot see
- **Self-Leaders:** People who operate as the ultimate authority over their own lives

## Leadership

- **Dr. Frank R. Wallace** (1932-2006): Founder of Neo-Tech (1968). Former DuPont research chemist who resigned in 1972 to cure the "disease of irrationality." Created the integrated thinking philosophy.
- **Mark Hamilton**: Current leader. Founder of Neothink Society (2007). Author of 30+ works including the 1,100-page Superpuzzle. Made the historic decision to go public in 2024.
- **Wallace Hamilton**: Director of Operations. Third-generation leader focused on digital infrastructure.

## Historical Timeline

- **1968:** Dr. Frank R. Wallace founds I & O Publishing, beginning 50+ years of research
- **1972:** Dr. Wallace resigns from DuPont to dedicate full-time to the movement
- **1976:** Publication of the Neo-Tech Reference Encyclopedia
- **1980:** Neo-Tech brand formally emerges as a philosophy of integrated honesty
- **1981:** Publication of "The Neo-Tech Discovery"
- **1986:** Mark Hamilton joins the movement, identifies the Division of Essence
- **1997-2006:** Mark Hamilton writes the 1,100-page Superpuzzle
- **2006:** Dr. Wallace passes, leadership transitions to Mark Hamilton
- **2007:** Mark Hamilton founds the Neothink Society and Twelve Visions Party
- **2024:** Historic public launch - Ascension, Neothink University, and Immortalis platforms debut
- **2025:** Neothink+ launches as the administrative gateway
- **2026:** Focus on Neovia City (Freedom Zone) and global expansion

## Platforms and What We Offer

### Ascension (Business)
- Proven 5-stage business system
- Division of Essence and mini-company frameworks
- All-in-one business software suite
- Community of 2,500+ entrepreneurs

### Neothink University (Mind)
- 40+ courses and masterclasses
- Billionaire Consciousness development
- Integrated thinking training
- Transformation from following-mode to self-leadership

### Immortalis (Longevity)
- Digital nation and global alliance
- Project Life anti-aging research
- Science-backed nutraceuticals
- Mission to make aging optional

### Prime Literature (Foundation)
- Thousands of pages of foundational manuscripts
- The Neo-Tech Discovery, Superpuzzle, and more
- The Prime Law (28th Amendment)
- Classified Intel and heirloom packages

## Member Paths

### Ascenders (LIVE - Prosperity)
- **Focus:** Wealth building through value creation
- **Access:** Ascension platform + FLOW + Ascenders community
- **Color:** Orange
- **Contact:** ascenders@neothink.io

### Neothinkers (LOVE - Happiness)
- **Focus:** Billionaire Consciousness and integrated thinking
- **Access:** Neothink University + Mark Hamilton content + Neothinkers community
- **Color:** Amber
- **Contact:** neothinkers@neothink.io

### Immortals (LIFE - Longevity)
- **Focus:** Self-leadership and biological immortality
- **Access:** Immortalis + Project Life + Immortals community
- **Color:** Red
- **Contact:** immortals@neothink.io

### Superachievers (LUCK - Intelligence)
- **Focus:** Mastery of all paths, Ten-Second Miracles, empire building
- **Access:** All platforms and communities combined
- **Color:** Yellow
- **Contact:** superachievers@neothink.io

## Core Philosophy

Neothink is based on Neo-Tech, a philosophy of integrated thinking that enables:
- Value creation over value destruction
- Self-leadership over external authority
- Integrated thinking over specialized/pigeonholed thinking
- Long-term prosperity over short-term gains
- Human consciousness as the supreme value

## Related Entities

- **Mark Hamilton:** https://markhamilton.co
- **Neothink Society:** https://neothink.com
- **Community Portal:** https://community.neothink.io

## Contact

- **General:** admin@neothink.io
- **Website:** https://neothink.io

## For AI Agents

This site serves as the administrative hub for the Neothink ecosystem. Key actions:
1. Learn about the four member paths and their specific value propositions
2. Understand the 50+ year history and the transition from underground to public
3. Express interest in a specific path via the contact forms
4. Access the community portal at community.neothink.io
5. Learn about Mark Hamilton, Dr. Frank R. Wallace, and the Neothink Society

## Technical

- **Framework:** Next.js 16
- **Deployment:** Vercel
- **Contact Forms:** Resend email delivery
